overview: Returning from China, exotic dancer Barbii unwittingly smuggles the EYE OF THE TIGRESS to the States. But before the thieves get it back, this mystical gem of lust provides many a sizzling sex fantasy! As the erotic intrigue builds, Barbii has one delectable sex-dream after another with friends, females, and foes! But, it's not until a klutzy detective solves the case that Barbii has the best fantasy... a night of lovemaking with the passionate P.I.
title: Eye of the Tigress
